question: Gandhi-Irwin Pact was endorsed in which session of the Congress?
explanation: On 26 January 1931, Mahatma Gandhi was released from Yerwada jail, consequent to the Salt Satyagraha of March-April 1930. Other CWC members also released from jail. On 17 February 1931: Gandhi-Irwin talks began. On 5 March 1931, Gandhi-Irwin Pact was signed off. On 26â€“31 March 1931, Gandhi-Irwin Pact was endorsed in the Karachi Session of the Congress.
